name: Big Ramp Philadelphia Website
descr: A modern gallery website built with Next.js and Sanity CMS, featuring dynamic content management and server-side rendering. The site showcases artwork with responsive image optimization, smooth navigation, and an intuitive admin interface for easy content updates. Utilizes Sanity's structured content API for real-time data fetching and Next.js static generation for optimal performance and SEO.

name: Iperdesign Icebreaker Card Game
descr: I developed this simple mobile card game for Iperdesign based on their pre-existing deck of icbreaker cards. The design is mobile first but desktop friendly. It is built using HTML, JavaScript and CSS.

name: Conor Maccormack Portfolio
descr: A portfolio website for fashion designer Conor Maccormack, built with React and hosted on Vercel. The site features a clean, modern design that highlights Conor's clothing designs through high-quality images and detailed project descriptions. It includes sections for biography, portfolio, and contact information, providing an engaging user experience.
